title: Issue/Confusion - Champ Select "Lock-In"
body:
This feature drives me nuts.
- If I select a champion and check runes/masteries (forgetting to click one button) I'm ejected and considered quitting/dodging.
- If my computer has a momentary glitch while clicking the button, I'm considered quitting/dodging.
- If I simply forget to click it, "dodging".
- Last second role swap due to chatting with my teammates - unable to click in time? Dodging/quitting too.

I don't think I've ever been so frustrated with a feature, and I don't understand anything it actually HELPS!
I don't know how much time my friends and I have spent waiting for a queue dodge to expire, for any number of reasons relating to this incredibly frustrating feature.

If someone has selected a champ, why wouldn't you auto-lock-in like it used to - prior to this ridiculous button?

Signed,
Irate customer - who will likely continue playing regardless - and is looking for a QoL improvement (Or some clarity on why it exists).

replies.body:
It sounds like a lot of your issues may be caused simply by a poor connection to our servers. This can be for a number of reasons, but the most frequent tend to be certain network settings that are simply problematic for League. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will walk you through configuring your settings properly for League.

Let me know if these steps helped.
